net.codemusic.smartears
Interface IExcercise

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdvancedChords, BasicChords, BasicScales, Intervals, Trichords
public interface IExcercise

This interface represents a collection of IAnswers that constitute a set of related structures to be learned together

Method Summary
 IAnswer[] getAnswers()
          Returns all of the IAnswers that constitute this excercise
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Returns a brief description of what kind of sounds are in the excercise

          Returns the name of this excercise, e.g.
